G'night.

::Autofire::

Autofire nods, noting that what Megatron had just said directly 
contradicted what he had said moments ago. Well, it kind of did.

"Allright. Lets get going then."

He aims his chaingun to the side, letting loose several dozen rounds 
into the wall. The wall is blown outward, revealing the transport pod 
that he and Adrax were going to use for transport.

"Get in," he says, walking to the pod, the hatch opening.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "First of all I do have a small number of troops, who are working 
on their
> ship. And I am Megatron, and fully powered, I take what I want, to 
satisfy
> my hunger, my hunger for power. We can start small, and work our 
way up.
> Find any who would be willing to follow us, and pursuade them". His 
energon
> was drastic now, he was hoping this would end soon.
